001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net;
002
003/**
004 * Ordered slice of TCP bytes emitted by a flow assembler for a single direction.
005 *
006 * @param flow flow identifier for the segment
007 * @param fromClient {@code true} when the bytes originated from the client
008 * @param data contiguous payload bytes; ownership is transferred to the {@link ByteStream}
009 * @param timestampMicros timestamp associated with the latest contributing segment (microseconds)
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public record ByteStream(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient, byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
013  /**
014   * Creates a byte stream record without copying payload data.
015   *
016   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017   */
018  public ByteStream {
019    data = data != null ? data : new byte[0];
020  }
021}
